title: ‘The Great British Baking Show’ Season 13, Episode 5: “Dessert Week”
description:
With Amelia living it up at BravoCon, Kate welcomes The Ringer’s Rob Mahoney to guest host on everybody’s favorite week: Dessert Week. They talk through the steamy signature, classic technical, and surprising showstopper before handing out awards and accolades.
Host: Kate Halliwell
Guest: Rob Mahoney
Producer: Sasha Ashall
